original_title: José Aparecido de Oliveira – O Maior Mineiro do Mundo
overview: Documentary that chronicles the trajectory of the journalist, federal deputy, secretary of state, minister of state, governor and ambassador José Aparecido de Oliveira, who lived with the greatest authorities and personalities from the political, business and cultural circles in Brazil and the world.
title: José Aparecido de Oliveira – O Maior Mineiro do Mundo
